readable.title: 2009636597_e3f4fe19fb
readable.content: A guy outside playing a guitar and smoking a cigarette . A man with an electric guitar smokes a cigarette sitting outside . A scruffy looking man smoking while sitting on the sidewalk and holding a guitar next to a bike of some sort . A young man is smoking a cigarette while holding a maroon guitar . Man playing an electric guitar on a sidewalk and smoking a cigarette .
